entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 7:19PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAINFALL OVER THE PAST FEW DAYS WILL MAINTAIN AN INCREASED THREAT OF LANDSLIDES IN WESTERN WASHINGTON INTO SATURDAY... Heavy precipitation over the past few days and weeks, as well as snowmelt, has increased soil moisture to saturated levels across western Washington. As heavy precipitation has ended, the threat of landslides will slowly decrease throughout the coming days.
